segments.text: Why are you handing me a plastic cup ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your doctor wants to test your urine and needs a sample .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How am I supposed to do that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We need you to urinate like you normally would , and then stop and finish into the cup .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What am I supposed to do with the cup when I am done ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Leave the cup in the cubby in the restroom . Just close the cubby door and walk away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of test is this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He wants to know if you have bacteria in your urine , which could signal an infection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will it take to get the results ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will send your doctor the results , and he will contact you .
segments.speaker: S2
